front.title: IEEE Draft Guide for the Preparation of a Transmission Line Design Criteria Document

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: A suggested outline for information that should be included in a Design Criteria for overhead transmission lines is presented. This Guide is not a Design Criteria or a Design Manual, it is a listing of the information that is required during the design of a transmission line, and provides guidance for line designers in the collection and documentation of how the line was designed; including the sources of information used in design and the design approach used
